summary: Pivot/rebrand SIDEHUSL into SIDEHU$L AI ($IDEHUSL AI): an AI-focused platform including a branded AI app builder experience (similar to caffeine.ai) plus wallet-based micropayments and creator resources, while retaining/expanding beyond the original side-job discovery concept.

existing_features.title: Create the SIDEHUSL application shell and navigation structure for a side-job discovery app focused on local/part-time opportunities in the tech and crypto industry.
Implement a coherent, distinctive visual theme for SIDEHUSL (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) and apply it consistently across all screens.
Support user submission of new opportunities from the frontend and corresponding backend API that runs screening on submission and stores the result.
Add a Featured/Promoted opportunity mechanism and ensure the first promoted listing is Xeris Mining with the link https://xerisweb.com/.

Build the Browse UI to display opportunities as cards/list items including title, tags (tech/crypto), remote/local, barrier-to-entry, and screening summary (validity/value scores + key reasons), with sorting options that prioritize higher screened quality by default.
Add an Opportunity details view that shows full description, external link, and a transparent explanation of screening results (reasons/flags).
Generate and include basic brand static assets for SIDEHUSL (logo and a hero/banner illustration) and render them from frontend/public/assets/generated in the UI.

Update the Home page hero section to use the user-uploaded image as a full-size, full-width header/hero image (instead of the current smaller right-column hero image), while keeping the existing hero headline, description, and CTA buttons readable via an overlay/gradient and ensuring responsive behavior across mobile and desktop.

Add a new “SIDEHU$L AI App Builder” section to the app that provides a chat-style app-building experience inspired by https://caffeine.ai/chat/019c44fe-3bba-76f5-9235-a41f2c9143c5, with all user-facing text in English and branded as “SIDEHU$L AI App Builder”.
Update the global navigation to include an entry point to the new “AI App Builder” page, available in both desktop navigation and the mobile menu.

Implement a deterministic, non-LLM “builder assistant” behavior for the chat UI that can produce structured outputs (e.g., an app outline, page list, data model sketch, and a step-by-step build plan) based solely on simple rules/templates, without calling any external AI services.

Add frontend data hooks (React Query) and UI wiring for builder sessions: load session list, create a new session, load message history, and append new user messages and assistant responses into the active session.

Update the Home/Landing page hero promo copy to position the product as an AI-powered app builder, using the exact headline text: "SIDEHU$L AI — BUILD YOUR HU$TLE TODAY" and supporting text that communicates "AI powered appbuilder for people to build their own app to make money as a side hustle" (in correct English). Apply these copy changes in the hero section of the landing page while keeping the existing full-width hero image, overlay gradient readability, and responsive behavior intact.

Update the Submit Opportunity form to include AI as a first-class category option alongside Tech and Crypto, and ensure the category selection is clearly framed as Tech/Crypto/AI-related submissions (update any relevant on-page helper copy in English).
Update Browse category filtering UI to include the new "AI" category option and adjust browse page helper copy to reflect Tech, Crypto, and AI opportunities.

Update the Home page header/hero section to prominently advertise the AI App Builder using striking, high-contrast styling and the exact hero headline text: "SIDEHUSL AI, BUILD YOUR SIDE HUSTLE TODAY!"
Adjust the Home page hero supporting copy and call-to-action buttons so the primary CTA clearly routes users to the AI App Builder page (/builder), while keeping all user-facing text in English.

Update the Home page hero headline text styling so the headline "SIDEHUSL AI, BUILD YOUR SIDE HUSTLE TODAY!" renders in a green-to-blue gradient color treatment (similar to an “Open App Builder” green/blue scheme), replacing the current primary/accent gradient on that headline only.

Remove the background color/backdrop behind the hero words on the Home page so the label text renders as plain text (no filled pill/gradient background), while keeping the existing hero headline and page layout intact.

Remove the Home page hero headline block that displays the text "SIDEHUSL AI, BUILD YOUR SIDE HUSTLE TODAY!" from the hero section on the landing page (frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx), while keeping the rest of the hero content (the "AI-Powered App Builder" label, supporting paragraph, and CTA buttons) intact and visually balanced.

On the landing page hero (frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx), move the supporting hero copy (the paragraph that starts with “Create your own AI-powered web app in minutes. No coding required.”) higher up in the header/landing page layout so it appears closer to the top of the hero area above the fold (especially on mobile), while keeping the existing hero label (“AI-Powered App Builder”), paragraph text, CTA buttons, overlay gradients, and responsiveness intact.

On the landing page hero (frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx), move the supporting hero copy paragraph that begins with “Create your own AI-powered web app in minutes. No coding required.” to the very top of the hero content (i.e., it should be the first hero text users see), with spacing adjusted so it sits as high as practical within the hero area on both mobile and desktop while remaining readable and visually balanced.

On the Home/Landing page hero (frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx), lower the two primary call-to-action buttons (“Open AI App Builder” and “Browse Opportunities”) by adjusting the hero layout spacing so the button row sits further down within the hero area on both mobile and desktop, while keeping all existing hero text, readability overlays, and responsive behavior intact.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create SIDEHUSL app concept: AI-powered finder for local/part-time side jobs focused on tech/crypto with low/no barrier to entry
Implement AI screening/ranking of listed jobs for validity and value (scam/low-quality filtering)
Add featured/promoted opportunity placement with Xeris Mining as the first promoted listing (https://xerisweb.com/)

Define and persist an Opportunity (side job) data model in the Motoko backend, including fields needed for local/part-time discovery and screening (e.g., title, company/source, description, link, category tags for tech/crypto, location/remote flag, estimated barrier-to-entry level, and created timestamps).

Implement backend APIs to support opportunity browsing: list opportunities with pagination and filters (at minimum: remote/local, category/tags, and barrier-to-entry), and fetch a single opportunity by id.

Implement an automated screening system in the backend that evaluates each opportunity for (1) validity and (2) value, producing numeric scores and human-readable reasons based on deterministic rules/heuristics (no external AI services).
Update UI so the hero/banner image displays as a full-size header/hero image (full-width prominent placement)
Adjust Home page full-width hero image behavior on mobile (responsive layout/cropping/overlay for readability).
Add wallet connect + account abstraction and support x402-based micropayments for services.
Add an "AI and prompt writers" course section for LLM/AI creators.
Aggregate and provide access to as many free AI and image generators as possible within the app.
Build an AI-powered app maker that provides coding services, including cloning existing code and enabling rebranding flows.
Add a rebranded AI app builder experience similar to https://caffeine.ai/chat/019c44fe-3bba-76f5-9235-a41f2c9143c5 under the SIDEHU$L AI brand.

Persist builder chat sessions in the Motoko backend, scoped per authenticated user (principal), including APIs to: create a session, append messages, list a user’s sessions, and fetch a session’s message history.

Update Home/Landing hero promo messaging to: "SIDEHU$L AI — BUILD YOUR HU$TLE TODAY" and position the product as an AI-powered app builder for people to build their own app to make money as a side hustle.
Refine the Opportunity submission section so users can submit/label opportunities across all Tech, Crypto, and AI-related categories (update tags/category options and any related UI copy/validation).
Remove the background color behind the hero/header text, leaving only the words visible (no colored backdrop).
Move the landing page header/hero supporting copy (e.g., "create your own AI powered app in minutes, no coding") higher up on the header/landing page layout.
Adjust the Home/Header hero layout to lower the "Open AI App Builder" and "Browse Opportunity" buttons (move them down on the header page for better spacing/alignment).
